programme.title: Blessing of Formosa(T) Ep183
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1018
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Love is Cold
programme.desc: In the mid-1990s in Macau, a teenage boy and girl kill someone and clean up the crime scene together. The girl is from China and is bullied in her new school. The boy is from a complicated family who has close ties to the gangster world. They are instantly attracted to each other when they met but who did they kill and will they get away with it?

programme.title: Look Out, Officer!
programme.desc: Stephen Chow is a delight in this supernatural action comedy about a murdered cop returning from beyond the grave to persuade a rookie (Chow) into avenging his death.

programme.title: The Fatal Raid
programme.desc: Twenty years after a deadly bloodbath between the Hong Kong Police and Macau gangsters, Madam Fong, the surviving team member, leads a new squad of four policewomen across borders to pursue young anarchists terrorizing Macau in a mission to protect the Hong Kong Polices Deputy Chief Commissioner.

programme.title: Somewhere Winter
programme.desc: The film follows the love story of a university student, An Ran and a Taiwanese man, Qi Xiao. They met and fell in love at a concert by Chyi Chin, a Taiwanese singer, in Beijing in 1991. However, courage alone may not be enough for the lovers to stay together, and goodbyes may truly mean the end. Will An Ran and Qi Xiao meet again in 2019?

programme.title: High Risk
programme.desc: After failing to save his wife, Kit resigned as a cop and becomes the bodyguard and stunt double for a cowardly action film star, Frankie. When attending a jewel exhibition, they run into a band of robbers. Kit identifies the murderer of his wife amongst them and chases after him. Will Frankie regain his courage to help Kit?

programme.title: The Way We Keep Dancing
programme.desc: This sequel of The Way We Dance features the plight of Hong Kongs grassroots performing artists as they fight against the governments plan to gentrify an industrial district where they settled in.

programme.title: Bangkok Storm
programme.desc: Underground boxer Lin Feng is hunted by the Bangkok triad when he refuses to fight in an illegal match. He escaped successfully but lost his memory. While Feng begins a new life, the triad finds him and hires a top boxer to beat him. As Feng suddenly regains his memory in the process, he vows to take down the triad.

programme.title: As Tears Go By
programme.desc: Mobsters Wah and Fly are buddies. Wah loves his cousin, but cannot make their relationship work as he is a mobster. Fly infuriates a mob boss one day and got beaten up badly, implicating Wah too. He then takes up a fatal task to make amends

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 2
programme.desc: In this sequel, Zhang Wu Ji successfully rescued the Six Major sects at Dadu. Nevertheless, the quest for the Dragon Sabre continues as Wu Ji and his three girlfriends set sail for Ice Fire Island. After a series of vicious fights, they finally unveil the secret behind the Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre.

programme.title: The Calling of a Bus Driver
programme.desc: A girl named Suki fulfills her dream of being a bus driver after breaking up with her boyfriend, who has an affair with her good friend. When Suki is invited to attend her ex-boyfriends wedding, she is presented with a chance for revenge will she take it and turn her life around?

programme.title: The Lady Iron Chef
programme.desc: Beer girl and part-time model Ceci has terrible cooking skills. Coming from a well-off family that owns a big culinary business, wealthy SK meets Ceci in a gourmet competition held by his family's company. Despite their different backgrounds, Ceci and SK fall for each other. However, SK's dominating mother disapproves of their relationship. To win over her future mother-in-law, Ceci must beat her rival Jade in a gourmet showdown

programme.title: Keep Rolling
programme.desc: Directorial debut of Man Lim Chung, who spent 3 years filming this documentary about the life and filmmaking philosophy of Ann Hui, one of Hong Kongs greatest filmmakers. It traces Huis life story and her 40-year careers ups and downs using film footages, candid conversations with Hui, and interviews with her collaborators, family and friends.

programme.title: Turns We Take
programme.desc: A spicy hot pot restaurant in Northeast China serves different types of customers every day. Amongst them are a sweet young couple, two wayward young men and a taxi driver. Despite being complete strangers to each other, their lives are intertwined by a traffic accident

programme.title: Cloudy Mountain
programme.desc: When a decade-long tunnel project is about to complete, an earthquake strikes and leads to a series of subsidence and landslides. The tunnel and a nearby town are at stake. A retired soldier and his son step up to try and stop the disasters at source. Will the authority decide to blow up the tunnel to save the 160,000 people in town?

programme.title: The Monkey is Back
programme.desc: The savior of the people, Stone Monkey, has given hope to a desperate little girl which he promises to realize. Years later, Stone Monkey is defeated in a battle with the three-eyed God of War, causing him to lose his power and falls into the mortal world. Can he fulfill his promise to the girl and stop the God of Wood from destroying earth?

programme.title: Hotel Deluxe
programme.desc: Bai Xing Hotel is a five-star luxury hotel located in Qian Dao Lake, Hang Zhou, with a service level only worthy of a four-star hotel. The head office sent Cruella Koo, a tough executive, to lead reforms for the hotel and upgrade the employees performance to reach the five-star level.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs III
programme.desc: Ming is transferred to do menial police work ten months after the murder of Yan, in 2004. Meanwhile, a new star, Wing, has emerged in the police force and Ming suspects he is also a mole sent by the triad. Determined to start anew, Ming must kill Wing while ensuring his own identity does not get exposed.

programme.title: 77 Heartwarmings
programme.desc: After breaking up with Adam, Eva focuses on her career but Adam still wants to make up and tries to move her 77 times. Things become more complicated when a Thai movie idol courts Eva. It is at this time that Evas mother becomes very ill, and she considers marriage in order to fulfil her mothers wish. Will Adam succeed in warming Evas heart?

programme.title: Legally Declared Dead
programme.desc: Insurance agent Sean visits Tak and Ling's home to follow up on a case and is shocked to see their son's corpse hanging above him. He suspects them of murdering their son to claim the insurance money and decides to launch his own investigation. As he becomes obsessed over their guilt, his kind nature is used against him by the real perpetrator.

programme.title: Iron Kung Fu Fist
programme.desc: Liang Kun is a skilled martial arts master who left the martial arts world to protect his lover. However, his disappearance leads to her tragic death and as Liang Kun finds a way to survive in the martial arts world, he fights back to avenge his lovers death with the help of a beggar gang leader.

programme.title: Golden Chickensss
programme.desc: Ah Kam is now a mama-san leading a team of young prostitutes to service the rich and famous, and she always aims to fulfil every clients needs. When Ah Kams ex-lover, a triad boss, encounters difficulties adapting to a new Hong Kong after his release from a long imprisonment, she helps him get back on his feet to lead a normal life.

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Programmer and gamer Hao Ming gets approached by mercenary Fei Qiao and businessman Takeshi, and is drawn into a shady hacking game in Malaysia. The cyber mission quickly turns dangerous as Hao Ming must navigate the hidden motives and dealings of the mercenaries and figure out who's behind it all.

programme.title: Chinese Odyssey 2002
programme.desc: Set in Ming Dynasty, young Emperor Zheng De escapes from the palace with his sister who disguised as a man. They run into a notorious wanderer who runs a restaurant with his boyish sister in Jiang Nan. The two pairs of siblings from vastly different social classes descend into an inescapable swirl of gender confusion, slapstick antics and love.

programme.title: Wolf Pack
programme.desc: The Wolf Pack squad led by Lao Diao, is a foreign-based team that specializes in overseas security jobs. In one of the missions, the squad discovers that a terrorist force is planning to destroy the countrys energy source. Lao Diao is now entrusted with the task of leading his squad to fight back. Can the Wolf Pack save the day?

programme.title: Bodyguards and Assassins
programme.desc: On 15 October 1906, Chinese revolutionary leader Sun Yat Sen returned to Hong Kong to stage another overthrow of the Qing dynasty. Businessman Lee and Chinese Dailys Chief Chan arrange for five bodyguards to protect Mr Sun - these are all extraordinary fighters who are ready and up for fierce battles against the Qing assassination army.

programme.title: Whatever You Want
programme.desc: An illegitimate daughter of a businessman gets three wishes from a genie, Bo. However, Bo's magical power is far from perfect, leading to much hilarity in this charming fantasy comedy.

programme.title: Integrity
programme.desc: Anti-corruption senior officer Chen lines up a key witness, corporate accountant Jack, to testify against a tobacco trading company CEO for bribing high-level customs officer as well as smuggling contraband cigarettes. When neither Jack nor the CEO shows up on the day of the hearing, Chen must team up with his ex-wife to launch an investigation.

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Henry Chen, a former soldier, is recruited for his toughest mission yet - teaching a class of teen delinquents. As he kicks his way into their school and home lives, it becomes clear that his unconventional teaching style might be just what they need.

programme.title: Paws-Men
programme.desc: When a dog is in need of rescue, the Paws-Men assemble to save the dog like Batman. Paws-Men tells the story of four men rescuing dogs and the many difficulties that they encounter, from a dog eatery to bullies and a dog abusing granny. Despite the hardships, Paws-Men give us a peek into the true friendships between dogs and humans.

programme.title: Bangkok Storm
programme.desc: Underground boxer Lin Feng is hunted by the Bangkok triad when he refuses to fight in an illegal match. He escaped successfully but lost his memory. While Feng begins a new life, the triad finds him and hires a top boxer to beat him. As Feng suddenly regains his memory in the process, he vows to take down the triad.

programme.title: All's Well End's Well 2012
programme.desc: This beloved slapstick comedy series continues as it follows four couples who meet through a dating website. Four men go on a heroic mission to help four women and wind up experiencing a series of mishaps.

programme.title: Flashover
programme.desc: This is based on a true story. A sudden earthquake hits the gas pipes in an industrial park, triggering massive explosions and engulfing the neighboring area in flames. When the Fire Rescue Force reaches the scene, firefighters must fight against the flames and time, as they commit to safeguard lives with their own.

programme.title: Love With The Perfect Stranger
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, salesman Bao meets a rich girl, Jin Jin, who just broke up with her boyfriend. Two equally heartbroken strangers fall in love instantly and get married on impulse. The couple lives happily together until Jin Jin finds herself pregnant with her ex-boyfriends baby...

programme.title: The Trail Of The Broken Blade
programme.desc: Chivalrous swordsman Fung goes in search of another swordsman on the run, Li Yue, in order to reunite him with his love. Though both men meet and end up being close friends, Li Yue did not reveal his true identity until Fungs life is endangered by a gang looking for revenge...

programme.title: Passing Flickers
programme.desc: This film is an amusing insiders look at the Hong Kong film industry and is based on Director Li Han Hsiangs popular newspaper column recounting his work at Shaw Brothers. The collection of some of his funniest and most surreal film musings of the era, filled with behind-the-scene asides, this is a must-see for any Hong Kong cinema aficionado!

programme.title: Crippled Avengers
programme.desc: Chu Twin becomes crazy after his sons arms were chopped off. For no reason, he harms four people causing them various disabilities. The four disabled form a band to learn Kung Fu from a master, in order to take revenge on Chu Twin.

programme.title: The Land Of Many Perfumes
programme.desc: Monk Tang San Zang, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing find themselves in Womanland, where women give birth to baby girls by drinking the magical spring water.

programme.title: Little Hero
programme.desc: An orphan, Little Bastard is taken on and trained as a fighter by a hermit. When Little Bastard grows up, he feels he is old enough to go out and look for his parents. Luckily for him, he befriends a beggar, Hsiao Yi, who being street-wise, manages to help him find his family, but somehow gets into trouble with the gang.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung And The Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung meets a famous courtesan in Suzhou and in order to spend as much time as possible with her, he builds a direct underground tunnel into the Forbidden City. The emperors sudden appearances through this direct access shock his people but it is also at this time that he helps the needy and cracks the gambling business in Suzhou.

programme.title: King Gambler
programme.desc: This film was actually a lively forerunner to the gambling film craze, which eventually swept Asian cinema. Here, it's cardsharp versus cardsharp with a lot more kung-fu action, in a battle of wits and fists to become the king of the casino. The double stings and triple crosses raise in complexity and imagination until what started as an unusual box office risk became a top ten hit of 1976.

programme.title: The Scandalous Warlord
programme.desc: General Feng occupies the city of Shandong, and soldiers and civilians alike welcome him without knowing his tyrannical and lustful nature. His first official business is to inspect the brothels and take the prostitutes home to become his concubines. Feng is finally killed by his officers, but will the new general rule the city differently?

programme.title: The Invincible Fist
programme.desc: A dedicated chief constable nicknamed The Invincible Fist is chasing after a band of bandits near a village one day and encounters an innocent blind girl. He quickly falls in love with her, but finds out she is the daughter of a vicious bandit. Will he kill the father of his lover?

programme.title: Mist Over Dream Lake
programme.desc: A young girl Chen is sent away by her parents who are going through divorce, to stay with the Changs. On the Changs farm, she meets their two sons, the youngest daughter and a young artist, and spends a summer with them that she will never forget.

programme.title: The Magnificent Trio
programme.desc: A group of farmers who are being oppressed by the local magistrates kidnap one of the magistrates daughter in the hope of being heard by the authorities. A wandering swordsman offers his help and aiding him are two fighters who have both switched sides from being the oppressors to the oppressed. The trio fight back against the magistrates!

programme.title: Princess Iron Fan
programme.desc: As Monkey and his gang make their way to the West through Fire Mountain, they ran into the evil Princess Iron Fan, Madam White Bone and her sexy sister, and have to fight their way through.

programme.title: The Assassin
programme.desc: Notorious assassin Nieh Cheng has retired into hiding. However, when Premier Yen's family is massacred, he seeks out the reclusive swordsman and coaxes him into a final revenge mission in this epic story set in the Six Kingdom era.

programme.title: Love Without End
programme.desc: Lin Dai stars in this romantic classic as a nightclub singer who falls for a young architect. When he suffers grave financial difficulty, she does the unthinkable to help him.

programme.title: The Sword Of Swords
programme.desc: The Sword Master passes on his sword to his disciple Lin before he dies. Another disciple Fang also eyes the sword and plots to take it away from Lin, destroying his family and blinding him in the process. Lin finally battles Fang for revenge and vows to reclaim his sword.

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperors death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: Clan Of The White Lotus
programme.desc: The head of White Lotus Clan, Lo, is a highly skilled martial artist who supports the Qing government and helps destroy the rebellion group. Hung from Shaolin who kills Los brother, is being hunted and hides in another rebel Hus house. The clan attacks at night killing Hu and his sister, but Hung manages to get Hus pregnant wife to safety.

programme.title: Blue Skies
programme.desc: A young singer Hsiao Yun becomes an overnight sensation after standing in for another singer at the eleventh hour. Her success comes at a heavy price however, when her love with a pianist suffers. On top of this, Hsiao Yun must also deal with the unwanted affections from an influential backer of her show.

programme.title: The Avenging Eagle
programme.desc: Qi Ming Xing, an assassin of the Iron Boat Clan, decides to quit the clan. When hunted by the clan, he is saved by Swordsman Zhuo Yi Fan. Zhuo accidentally discovers that Qi is the killer of his wife, but he forgives Qi after knowing Qis guilt over her death. The two finally team up to destroy the evil clan.

programme.title: Forbidden Tales Of Two Cities
programme.desc: Li Han-hsiang wrote and directed this charming and fascinating comedy, Forbidden Tales Of Two Cities. The two cities in the picture are Macau, where a love quartet is a morally-unsound source for sexual entertainment; and Hong Kong, where a woman enters a gamblers apartment to find four shackles hanging from his ceiling to aid in kinky activities.

programme.title: Heaven And Hell
programme.desc: When an angel, Ling, decides to help his two friends who have fallen in love to escape from Heaven, he is sent to live as a human on earth as his punishment. Reincarnated as a cab driver, he sacrifices his own life to save another ill-fated couple and lands in hell, where he has to face off against the ghosts and demons to fight his way out!

programme.title: Return Of The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This sequel makes for more bittersweet laughs and heart-wrenching misfortune, as Ah Niu gets out of the jail to find his true love becoming the wife of an abusive husband, and his uncle further exploits his naive nature.

programme.title: The 82 Tenants
programme.desc: Continuing the success of the classic comedy House of 72 tenants, this sequel tells the stories of tenants living in an old building in Hong Kong who are forced to evict by the developers. Some tenants prefer to take the compensation while some resist the move. Will the acquisitions plan destroy the harmony of the neighborhood?

programme.title: The Amorous Lotus Pan
programme.desc: Adapted from the renowned Chinese novel, The Water Margin, this is the story of a poor and beautiful girl Lotus Pan, who is raped by her master and had to be married off to a midget who treats her badly. Lost and lonely, Pan unwittingly becomes a pawn in the game of lust between her husbands playboy brother Wu Song, and a murderous man Men Ching.

programme.title: Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: Wei Chun is a cocky young man sentenced to jail for killing a man in a fight. One day, Wei Chun picks a fight with a seemingly defenseless old man who completely thrashes him! The old man turns out to be the master of monkey style kung fu and as they become friends, he gives Wei Chun half of a medallion that would direct him to hidden secrets.

programme.title: Two Con Men
programme.desc: Two Con Men is a wonderfully twisted, pseudo-romantic comedy in the vein of "Robin Hood" meets "The Sting". Starring Liang Tien as Clever Chan and Chang Ying (who's done over 400 films) as Tricky Ching, it's the age-old competition between a rookie con artist versus the ultimate, experienced flimflam man. It's a game Chen cannot afford to lose, because people's lives - including his own, hang in the balance of good versus evil.

programme.title: The Brave Archer 3
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong go to Iron Palm Peak to search for the Book of Wumu. The chief of Iron Palm discovers their visit, and seriously injures Huang. It seems only the Southern Emperor Duan can heal her, but will Huang be healed in time?

programme.title: Madam White Snake
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai is perfect as Pak Su-cheng, the stunning snake goddess who assumes a womanly form so that she can taste the pleasures of a human life! Pak seduces young scholar, Hsu Hsien when she recognises him as her saviour in another life 1,000 years ago. But when Buddhist monk Fa Hai finds out about the union, the pair is forced to split...

programme.title: The Blood Brothers
programme.desc: The friendship of three sworn brothers, Zhang, Huang and Ma ends when Ma gives in to corruption and falls for Huang's wife, eventually leading to a bloody ending.

programme.title: The Empress Dowager
programme.desc: Award-winning drama featuring a passionate performance by Lisa Lu, enhanced by sumptuous costumes and sets, produces a powerful, fascinating story. In five thousand years of Chinese history, there was never a more fascinating woman than the dragon lady of the Ching Dynasty, also the Empress Dowager, who was the power behind the throne for the last half of the 19th century. The vast tapestry of palace intrigues is vividly brought to the screen.

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: Hsieh Choun, the Black Dragon, is in trouble with the police since Wang Sien Tien's gang is helping them; he is no longer free to conduct his drugs shipments out of the port freely as he used to. He buys more thugs and killers to dispose of the young upstart, and soon Wang is in dire straits, in the port of Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Mirror And The Lichee
programme.desc: The curious title in this Huangmei Opera romance refers to the two props that signal a happy beginning between a scholar and a local beauty. The scholar polishes mirrors so as to be closer to his love, who signals her approval by tossing him some lichees. From that point on the course of their love becomes rocky, complete with murder and suicide.

programme.title: Flying Guillotine 2
programme.desc: In a time of anti-Manchu sentiment, Emperor Yong Zheng employs his ruthless Blood Hound Corps to silence any dissenters. Only one man and his signature weapon, The Flying Guillotine, stand in their way.

programme.desc: While on assignment to the Sinai coast, Swedish photojournalist Ingrid is kidnapped by a group of Palestinian men and hidden in the desert. An unlikely love affair arises between Ingrid and one of her captors, Ali.

programme.title: Helen
programme.desc: Helen is an 18-year-old orphan in a perpetual search for her identity. One day, she is picked by the police to play the role of a missing student in a re-enactment. As she interacts with the distraught family of the victim, healing slowly comes to her.

programme.title: Spin
programme.desc: SPIN seeks to explore circumstance versus choice, breaking points, and second chances through the lives of two men in the city and their incidental yet preordained meeting in a one-way alley that would change their lives thereafter.

programme.title: Meisie
programme.desc: A young school teacher is posted to a small rural town, where she meets Meisie, a gifted girl who wants to learn but isnt allowed to. Before she can teach Meisie, the teacher must first convince her father of the benefits and importance of education.

programme.title: Commitment Hasan
programme.desc: Farmer Hasan is at a crossroads between challenges and new opportunities. A high-voltage mast can end up in the middle of his fertile and cultivated land. But can this invasion of modernity be resolved now that the neighbouring plot is for sale?

programme.title: Domingo
programme.desc: After his divorce, 55-year-old Domingo embarks on a belated journey to fulfil his lifelong dream to become a sports commentator. Though he aspires to join the local TV station, his commentaries are unknowingly leaving an impact on his community.

programme.title: Once Upon A Time In Calcutta
programme.desc: Having just lost her daughter and disillusioned with her marriage, Ela decides to start an independent life of her own. Unable to secure a housing loan, she uses her boss, the owner of a ponzi scheme, to get what she wants.

programme.title: Who Framed Santa Claus?
programme.desc: Wonderfast, a highly successful online delivery company, enjoys great business all year around except during Christmas. Despite attempts to sabotage Santa Claus, their efforts produce unexpected results. Will the Christmas spirit prevail after all?

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: The Embassy Attack
programme.desc: When terrorists seize the German embassy in Tunis, Karla discovers Esra, her young proteg, is a double agent belonging to the terrorist group. Can she use her personal connection with the young woman to avoid a massacre?

programme.title: Deserted
programme.desc: While on assignment to the Sinai coast, Swedish photojournalist Ingrid is kidnapped by a group of Palestinian men and hidden in the desert. An unlikely love affair arises between Ingrid and one of her captors, Ali.

programme.title: Meisie
programme.desc: A young school teacher is posted to a small rural town, where she meets Meisie, a gifted girl who wants to learn but isnt allowed to. Before she can teach Meisie, the teacher must first convince her father of the benefits and importance of education.

programme.title: A River Within
programme.desc: Five women with their own personal struggles travel to the Orange River for their Adventure Therapy. When things go awry in their river rafting adventure, their survival instincts kick in forcing them to dig deep.

programme.title: Commitment Hasan
programme.desc: Farmer Hasan is at a crossroads between challenges and new opportunities. A high-voltage mast can end up in the middle of his fertile and cultivated land. But can this invasion of modernity be resolved now that the neighbouring plot is for sale?

programme.title: Thirst
programme.desc: On a hilltop in Bulgaria plagued by drought, a couple and their teenage son eke out a living doing laundry for local hotels. The arrival of a well-digger and his daughter promises not only to quench their thirst for water, but for something far stronger.

programme.title: Domingo
programme.desc: After his divorce, 55-year-old Domingo embarks on a belated journey to fulfil his lifelong dream to become a sports commentator. Though he aspires to join the local TV station, his commentaries are unknowingly leaving an impact on his community.

programme.title: The Little Comrade
programme.desc: During Stalinist tyranny, 6-year-old Leelos mother is sent to a prison camp. Haunted by her mothers last words telling her to be a good kid, Leelo vows to be on her best behaviour in the hope that it will bring her mother back.

programme.title: Once Upon A Time In Calcutta
programme.desc: Having just lost her daughter and disillusioned with her marriage, Ela decides to start an independent life of her own. Unable to secure a housing loan, she uses her boss, the owner of a ponzi scheme, to get what she wants.

programme.title: Blackbird
programme.desc: Sean, a rebellious teenager, is falsely accused of planning a school massacre. He must survive a harrowing conflict with a prison gang leader while he attempts to prove his innocence to the community and those close to him.

programme.title: Murder Party
programme.desc: Jeanne, a brilliant architect, is appointed to restore the sumptuous Daguerre mansion owned by an eccentric family. When the patriarch is found dead during a murder party, Jeanne finds herself caught up in a real-life investigation to unmask the killer.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: The Whistleblower
programme.desc: When a U.S. Army deserter is granted asylum over claims of evidence of an alleged U.S. torture prison in the Czech Republic, Karlas position as the new German ambassador in Prague is threatened. In order to find the truth, she is willing to risk it all.

programme.title: Zodiac
programme.desc: There's more than one way to lose your life to a killer. The hunt is on for a serial killer in San Francisco. Few cases in the history of true crime are as intriguing as that of Zodiac, a bizarre gunman in an executioner's hood, who taunts the police with dozens of letters containing eerie messages and cryptograms. Director David Fincher (Panic Room, Fight Club, Se7en) captures the story of the infamous killer who terrorized the city in the late 1960s. Jake Gyllenhaal (Jarhead, The Day After Tomorrow), Robert Downey, Jr. (Kiss Kiss, Bang Bang), Anthony Edwards ("ER") and Mark Ruffalo (We Don't Live Here Anymore, Rumor Has It...) star.

programme.title: In The Heart Of The Sea
programme.desc: Oscar winner Ron Howard (A Beautiful Mind) directs the action adventure based on the best-selling book about the dramatic true journey of the whaling ship Essex. In the winter of 1820, the New England whaling vessel Essex was assaulted by something no one could believe: a whale of mammoth size and will, and an almost human sense of vengeance. The real-life maritime disaster would inspire Herman Melville's Moby Dick. But that told only half the story. In The Heart of The Sea reveals the encounter's harrowing aftermath, as the ship's surviving crew is pushed to their limits and forced to do the unthinkable to stay alive. Braving storms, starvation, panic and despair, the men will call into question their deepest beliefs, from the value of their lives to the morality of their trade, as their captain searches for direction on the open sea and his first mate (The Avengers' Chris Hemsworth) still seeks to bring the great whale down.

programme.title: War Dogs
programme.desc: The Wolf of Wall Street's Jonah Hill and Whiplash's Miles Teller star in this dramedy based on a true story that follows two twenty-something Miami stoners who exploit a little-known government initiative during the Iraq War that allows small businesses to bid on U.S. Military contracts. Starting small, they begin raking in big money and are soon living the high life. But the pair gets in over their heads when they land a $300 million deal to arm the Afghan Military -- a deal that puts them in business with some very shady people, not the least of which turns out to be the U.S. Government. Comedy powerhouse Todd Phillips (The Hangover films) writes, directs and produces (with Bradley Cooper) this incredible true story based on a controversial Rolling Stone article.

programme.desc: Five Minutes - Officer Nolan and Officer Chen's run-in with an infamous thief tips them off to a potentially big heist surrounding the Getty's big gala event. Meanwhile, Nolan works up the courage to ask Bailey out on date.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior Junior S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Qualifier 3 - American Ninja Warrior Junior is back and more extra than ever. This season, the series is taking the nation's top junior athletes and putting them on the world's most iconic course to compete on some of the most challenging obstacles yet. They'll put their mental and physical strength to the test as they go head-to-head in extra competitive, extra inspiring and extra fun races. These junior athletes will bring their best ninja skills, indomitable spirits and fearless attitudes to the course but only three junior athletes will become the next American Ninja Warrior Junior champions.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles S13 Ep4
programme.desc: Sorry For Your Loss - As Callen continues hunting Katya, Kilbride enlists NCIS to help find a truckload of stolen guns. The assignment becomes more challenging when their suspect, the son of a mob boss they believe was planning to sell them, is found dead.

programme.title: FBI: International S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Voice Of The People - When a group of Americans are among the victims of a bombing at a festival in Budapest, the team is brought in to find the perpetrators before they strike again.

programme.title: NCIS: Hawai'i S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Vanishing Act - When Cam comes to NCIS after his mom, Allie, goes missing, we learn a bounty hunter is searching for her after she embezzled millions from her former employer ten years prior. After communicating with her via Minecraft, they arrange a meeting where she's kidnapped; but it isn't the bounty hunter. Instead, he leads her kidnappers right to her. It turns out she didn't embezzle anything. The real embezzlers are after her with the assumption that she has information on their dealings.

programme.title: The Rookie S4 Ep3
programme.desc: In The Line Of Fire - Officer Nolan and officer Chen report to a structure fire and suspect that there is more to the situation than meets the eye. Meanwhile, after witnessing a sniper shooting, the team searches for the shooter and discovers that the perpetrator has a connection to one of their own.

programme.title: CSI: Vegas S2 Ep13
programme.desc: Boned - The CSI team investigates the death of an archaeologist found near the breakthrough discovery of an ancient civilization. Also, Max locates another cryptic note written in familiar silver ink after a mentally distressed woman kills her attacker.

programme.title: FBI: Most Wanted S4 Ep10
programme.desc: False Flag - The team is thrown for a loop when they discover that the abductor of a disgraced state police detective is connected to someone from a recent case.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles S13 Ep5
programme.desc: Divided We Fall - When an NCIS mission to protect a compromised undercover agent goes completely sideways, the agents are individually interrogated to find out what really happened. Also, Kilbride must make a difficult decision.

programme.title: FBI: International S1 Ep9
programme.desc: One Kind Of Madman - The team jets to Bulgaria when terrorists hold hostage for millions in cryptocurrency a concert hall filled with multinational student performers and their families.

programme.title: CSI: Vegas S2 Ep14
programme.desc: Third Time's The Charm - The CSIs investigate the mysterious death of a competitive eating contestant, and Chavez partners with Allie to prove where the mysterious silver ink notes have been coming from.

programme.title: NCIS: Hawai'i S2 Ep8
programme.desc: Curtain Call - When a naval officer is murdered while moonlighting in community theater, the NCIS team recruits a familiar face to help lead them to a ruthless international killer. Also, Kai enlists Whistler to open an investigation into an old friend turned criminal.

programme.title: The Rookie S4 Ep5
programme.desc: A.C.H. - When a new designer drug hits LA streets, it turns users into "zombies," and Officer Nolan and the team have a Halloween they won't soon forget. Back at home, Lucy questions whether her apartment building might be haunted.

programme.title: The Rookie: Feds S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Flashback - When Garza's character comes into question, Simone and team develop their own covert operation to support their boss.

programme.title: FBI: Most Wanted S4 Ep12
programme.desc: Black Mirror - When two Vermont teens are kidnapped on their way home from a basketball game, the team is led to a wayward pastor and his brother. Also, Remy attends a hearing for his brother's murderer.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles S13 Ep7
programme.desc: Lost Soldier Down - NCIS investigates the apparent suicide of a Navy intelligence officer who leapt to his death after taking LSD.

programme.title: FBI: International S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Chew Toy - When an NYPD officer is detained in Transnistria for aggravated assault, the Fly Team investigates his claims of infiltrating a sex trafficking ring being concealed by those in power.

programme.title: CSI: Miami S10 Ep19
programme.desc: Habeas Corpes - When one of the CSI's biggest enemies is murdered, Horatio must determine which of his team members is a suspect, on the 10th season finale of CSI: MIAMI. Malcolm McDowell returns as ruthless attorney Darren Vogel.

programme.title: Men In Black
programme.desc: Aliens have landed, but not everyone knows that! Only the Men in Black can save the world after aliens threaten to blow it up. Stars Will Smith and Tommy Lee Jones.

programme.title: The Bionic Woman S1 Ep02
programme.desc: Welcome Home Jamie Part II - Jaime Sommers begins a new life teaching school during the week and working for OSI on weekends.

programme.title: Bewitched S2 Ep33
programme.desc: The Catnapper - Charlie Leach witnesses Endora turn one of Darrin's clients into a cat and steals it away. Samantha decides to teach him once and for all not to mess with her.

programme.title: Quantum Leap S2 Ep15
programme.desc: Her Charm - Sam becomes an FBI agent who is assigned to guard a woman targeted for assassination by her drug-dealing ex-boss.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S5 Ep11
programme.desc: Angel On The Line - Mary and her very attractive friend, Lois, go to the Hot Line Club, a singles club with a phone at each table. The phone rings and the caller asks to speak to Lois.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S2 Ep23
programme.desc: Tennis, Anyone? - George accepts Judge Markel's invitation to join the all-white Windsor Tennis Club for networking purposes, then finds out he was only invited to be the club's "token minority" and appease the local media.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S2 Ep24
programme.desc: The Wedding - George and Louise plan to renew their wedding vows. But then George enrages Louise by failing to treat her as an equal partner in their marriage.

programme.title: The Bionic Woman S1 Ep03
programme.desc: Angel Of Mercy - Jaime, disguised as a nurse, is assigned to fly into a civil war-torn South American country to rescue the American ambassador and his wife.

programme.title: Bewitched S2 Ep34
programme.desc: What Every Young Man Should Know - Samantha is not totally convinced Darrin would marry her if he knew she was a witch. Endora sends Darrin and Samantha back in time to find out.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible S1 Ep07
programme.desc: Wheels - Dan Briggs enlists the aid of Rollin Hand to prevent the pro-Eastern elements in a foreign country from rigging a Parliamentary election in "Wheels"

programme.title: Cheers S3 Ep19
programme.desc: Behind Every Great Man - Sam's reputation as a ladies' man is on the line when Paula Nelson, an astute reporter from Boston Scene magazine, visits Cheers to do a story on the singles scene and is immediately turned off by Sam.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot S1 Ep06
programme.desc: Triangle Of Rhodes - Hercule Poirot is holidaying in Rhodes where he takes on the case of a tourist accused of murder in a case of crime passionnel. Poirot is determined to find the real murderer.

programme.title: The Nanny S1 Ep09
programme.desc: The Christmas Show - Though excited to learn that she will be working on Christmas Day, Fran is surprised to hear that Maxwell will be producing a benefit in Washington D.C.

programme.title: Cheers S3 Ep20
programme.desc: If I Ever Would Leave You - When Carla's sleazy ex-husband gets thrown out by his new wife, he comes groveling back to Carla, vowing to prove his love for her by being her slave. Soon everyone, except Carla, believes him.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible S1 Ep08
programme.desc: The Ransom - Egan, an underworld czar facing a grand jury indictment, forces Briggs into a daring kidnap of the state's prime witness, Gorman, by holding the daughter of a close friend captive in "The Ransom"

programme.title: Quantum Leap S2 Ep16
programme.desc: Freedom - Sam leaps into the life of a young American Indian in 1970, outrunning the law to let his ailing grandfather die with dignity.

programme.desc: The Nanny-In-Law - Preparing for the arrival of his old nanny, Maxwell makes sure that the house is in order and that the children are ready.

programme.desc: The Executive's Executioner - Norm's boss makes him an offer he can't refuse: accept a promotion or lose his job! So Norm is promoted to "Corporate Killer," the person in charge of firing employees.

programme.desc: A Spool There Was - The IMF accepts the assignment of recovering a reel of recording wire detailing a chemical warfare project being developed against the free world in "A Spool There Was"

programme.title: Life Below Zero S9 Ep7
programme.desc: Fast Food - As winter's chill grips the Arctic, the path forward will require trial and error. Living in the secluded state of Alaska means one wrong decision could cost you your life.

programme.title: Planet Earth III S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Extremes - David Attenborough reveals the extraordinary ways in which animals battle to survive the elements in a world of extremes. From mountain summits to scorching deserts, polar tundra to deep underground caves, these remote places are rarely visited, yet the animals that survive there are some of the most resilient and specially adapted on Earth.

programme.title: Extreme Treks S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Nepal - The Mustang Kingdom - Join Ryan as he treks through the Upper Mustang Kingdom and explores a remote Himalayan Kingdom in central Nepal.

programme.title: Kate Humble's Coastal Britain S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Yorkshire - On a 15-mile walk in North Yorkshire, Kate sets off from the picturesque village of Robin Hood's Bay, heading towards Scarborough where a refreshing dip in the sea awaits her.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep13
programme.desc: See how the decadent flavour of ice cream is made with chocolate pudding and cookies. Plus, how champagne and strawberry lollipops are made, and how truffle pigs are filled with peanut butter.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep14
programme.desc: Revealing the mouthwatering secrets behind tasty treats. This episode looks at how healthy muffins and red-hot candies are made.

programme.title: Lion: The Rise and Fall of the Marsh Pride S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Marsh Pride of lions have lived for generations in Kenya's famous Maasai Mara Reserve. The pride's history is a tale of shifting loyalties, bloody take overs and sheer resilience. Naturalists, guides, vets and conservationists in Kenya and back in the UK offer a unique perspective on the life of these lions.

programme.title: Martin Clunes: Islands of the Pacific S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Martin travels to Papua New Guinea and lives amongst the subsistence farmers of the Trobriand Islands. There, he plays their favourite game - cricket! Next he visits the volcanic island of New Britain. Both are a reminder of the fragility of island existence in this part of the Pacific Ocean.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S5 Ep5
programme.desc: In the US a man and his dog take cover as a rare tornado outbreak rips through towns on the East coast. In Norway, a boxer has the fight of his life when a swim under the ice goes disastrously wrong and in Western Australia, a homeowner is in a faceoff with the flames.

programme.title: Life Below Zero S9 Ep9
programme.desc: Winter Reigns - As the cold season wanes in the Arctic, winter does not go quietly into the night.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Strength in Sisterhood - The Hollywood pride reels after the Nomads brutal attack on their leader, Ava, leaves her desperately weak and unable to hunt. To add to her woes, her hungry pride start rejecting her. But without her, they struggle to bring down prey.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Mountains - Climb into a realm of thin air and towering rock. Tag along as mythical monkeys battle for a winter food stash, sing along with lemurs in a fruit-filled tree canopy, and watch an aromatic tree bring together blossom and possum in a moonlit tryst.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Tropical Shores - Explore the shores of the Northern Territory and the abundant waters of the Great Barrier Reef. Face flooded roads, hungry saltwater crocs, and killer jellyfish as Lizzie investigates why so many strange, deadly creatures make this remote area home.

programme.title: Extreme Africa 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Dragon Mountain: Surviving the Summit - South Africa's Drakensberg is one of the continent's most impressive landscapes. It is home to sharp climatic and ecological gradients as physical conditions change for both land-based creatures and the Raptors that swirl in the skies above.

programme.title: Extreme Africa 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Lake Manyara National Park - In north Tanzania, towering mountains line a dramatic valley. Enriched by ancient volcanoes, its slopes provide a variety of habitats for life to thrive and its great centerpiece holds water through even the driest of times.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Canada - Canada, where summer is short and time is tight any time is the right time to fight. The mighty North provides the setting for bison, bald eagles, and polar bears to wage some of the most heavy-duty fighting in the animal kingdom.

programme.title: Wild Birds of Australia 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Secret Life of the Emu - The Emu is Australias biggest native bird and is the second largest bird in the world after the African ostrich: two meters tall, with an almost three metre running stride and totally flightless. This bird inhabits a topsy turvy world, where females call the shots, eggs are green and men do all the work to produce and raise tiny babies, known as Stripeys.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Delta Discoveries - The Western Arctics mammoth Mackenzie Delta is the second largest in North America after the Mississippi. Here we find strange and mysterious land forms above an immense underbelly of permafrost featuring a phenomenal diversity of microorganisms, and strange creatures that tell a story of an ever changing Arctic. This is the migratory destination - and summer home - to several million birds, fish, animals. .. and humans.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Invasion Begins - When the all-female Hollywood pride encounters the Nomads, a new pride of rival males, they may have found the answer to their mating dry spell. But they quickly realize that it will not be a happy encounter.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Strength in Sisterhood - The Hollywood pride reels after the Nomads brutal attack on their leader, Ava, leaves her desperately weak and unable to hunt. To add to her woes, her hungry pride start rejecting her. But without her, they struggle to bring down prey.

This bird inhabits a topsy turvy world, where females call the shots, eggs are green and men do all the work to produce and raise tiny babies, known as Stripeys.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Highlands - Cape Breton Highlands National Park was established to protect the primeval forest from clear-cutting but today the park faces a new threat. Moose, beavers and moths have combined to decimate large sections of the Boreal and Acadian woodlands

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Invasion Begins - When the all-female Hollywood pride encounters the Nomads, a new pride of rival males, they may have found the answer to their mating dry spell. But they quickly realize that it will not be a happy encounter.

programme.title: Extreme Africa 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Dragon Mountain: Surviving the Summit - South Africa's Drakensberg is one of the continent's most impressive landscapes. It is home to sharp climatic and ecological gradients as physical conditions change for both land-based creatures and the Raptors that swirl in the skies above.

programme.title: Extreme Africa 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Lake Manyara National Park - In north Tanzania, towering mountains line a dramatic valley. Enriched by ancient volcanoes, its slopes provide a variety of habitats for life to thrive and its great centerpiece holds water through even the driest of times.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep7
programme.desc: South America - From the Amazon to the Andes, South America has some beautiful scenery. From guanacos sparring over grassland, to marine iguanas head-butting over a beachhead, to home-stealing hermit crabs, the quest for real estate causes a lot of conflict.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Wetlands - Wild Wild Easts wetland habitats are at risk. These marshes and bogs are the ancient home of the endangered Blandings Turtle. But each fall new turtles spring from the lake shores of Nova Scotia. If the vulnerable Blandings can make it through their first few years of life, they'll live for almost a century. But saving the turtle means protecting the wetlands, and all the other amphibians and reptiles that call the slow-moving waters home.

programme.title: Wild Birds of Australia 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Aerial Hunters - Australias birds of prey are some of the region's fiercest predators. These highly specialised killers are powerful, resourceful and striking; they use some impressive weapons to survive. This is the story of Australias aerial hunters.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Fall on the Tundra - Nunavik, meaning Great Land, is bigger than California. It is a pristine wilderness of water, forest and tundra, and home to the Inuit of Northern Quebec.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Snares Islands/ Tini Heke - Venture to the pristine wilderness of the Snares Islands, a remote animal sanctuary protected from the turbulent sea. Hop along with a colony of Snares crested penguins, soar with giant petrels and sooty shearwaters, and roar with giant sea lions.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Lean on Me - Observe blossoming friendships and interspecies bonds in nursery school, and peek inside a bromance among junior-school buds Valentino, Yutris and Madara. See distractible Beni lean into his love of food and get a beating from a more-senior pupil.

programme.title: Extreme Africa 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Dragon Mountain: Surviving the Summit - South Africa's Drakensberg is one of the continent's most impressive landscapes. It is home to sharp climatic and ecological gradients as physical conditions change for both land-based creatures and the Raptors that swirl in the skies above.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Lyca the Painted Wolf - In central Namibia, a pack of painted wolves roams the arid land. Amid threats from lions and drought, a plucky little pup called Lyca has to grow up fast, learn the skills of a hunter, and find her place as member of the pack.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Chinga the Lion Cub - In South Africas Greater Kruger Park, A little cub called Chiga has been born into family of hunters - the Mala Mala lion pride. Under the guidance of a devoted father, a fierce mother, and a playful sister, Chiga finds her place in the pride.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Southeast Asia - With real-life dueling dragons, giant sumo-wrestling beetles, street-fighting monkeys, and sea turtles that play king of the hill on top of another sea turtle, Southeast Asia boasts a wide range of wildlife warriors.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep9
programme.desc: Crustaceans - The relationships between species like lobsters, scallops and crabs are numerous and complicated. Changing water temperature is bringing invasive species to the Wild Wild East, putting pressure on the species humans count on for important commercial harvests.

programme.title: Wild Birds of Australia 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Feathering Nest - Successful breeding is critical to the survival of any bird species, and in this episode we meet four species of birds which go to exceptional lengths to find mates and raise their young, giving the next generation the best chance of life. Wherever they live, these birds have got their work cut out, holding their territory against invaders, attracting and winning partners and safeguarding their chicks.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Wild Seas - On the north-east coast of Baffin Island, in Canadas Arctic, lies Ninginganiq, a blustery wilderness where only the intrepid travel. In fall, it is so dangerous that even seasoned Inuit sailors keep away.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Otago Peninsula/ Muaupoko - Set sail for New Zealands Otago Peninsula, a breeding refuge for endangered seabirds and marine mammals. Watch as sea lions, albatrosses, red-billed gulls, white-fronted terns, and fairy prions find mates, then nurture the next generation.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Growing Pains - Experience a roller coaster of emotions and growing pains as the sanctuarys orangutans move through six grades toward their release into the wild. Discover how Dillas fate suddenly changes, and watch as big boy Beni goes on an unwelcome diet.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Lyca the Painted Wolf - In central Namibia, a pack of painted wolves roams the arid land. Amid threats from lions and drought, a plucky little pup called Lyca has to grow up fast, learn the skills of a hunter, and find her place as member of the pack.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Chinga the Lion Cub - In South Africas Greater Kruger Park, A little cub called Chiga has been born into family of hunters - the Mala Mala lion pride. Under the guidance of a devoted father, a fierce mother, and a playful sister, Chiga finds her place in the pride.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep2

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Mountains - Climb into a realm of thin air and towering rock. Tag along as mythical monkeys battle for a winter food stash, sing along with lemurs in a fruit-filled tree canopy, and watch an aromatic tree bring together blossom and possum in a moonlit tryst.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Tropical Shores - Explore the shores of the Northern Territory and the abundant waters of the Great Barrier Reef. Face flooded roads, hungry saltwater crocs, and killer jellyfish as Lizzie investigates why so many strange, deadly creatures make this remote area home.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Southeast Asia - With real-life dueling dragons, giant sumo-wrestling beetles, street-fighting monkeys, and sea turtles that play king of the hill on top of another sea turtle, Southeast Asia boasts a wide range of wildlife warriors.

programme.desc: Captain's Paradise - A couple with deep roots in the historic town of Bethany Beach, Delaware, decides to buy a classic beach cottage a block away from the water.

programme.title: Big Beach Builds S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Big Family, Bigger Beach Home - Marnie maximizes space and preserves the integrity of a growing family's Bethany Beach dream home.

programme.title: Expedition Bigfoot S4 Ep1
programme.desc: Bigfoot Island - After finding strange evidence in California, the team journeys to Prince of Wales Island, Alaska, to find Bigfoot. There, mysterious screams terrify the locals.

programme.title: Trip Flip S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Maui - Bert Kreischer gives two Los Angeles locals a free dream vacation to Maui.

programme.title: Trip Flip S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Rome - Bert Kreischer gives two best friends a free surprise 3 day vacation in Rome, Italy.

programme.title: Portals To Hell S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Hill View Manor - Jack and Katrina investigate an abandoned nursing home in New Castle, Pennsylvania. They cross paths with a malevolent shadow creature called the Creeper.

programme.title: Beyond The Unknown S2 Ep13
programme.desc: Texas Roswell Skull Of Doom And Dracula - Don Wildman investigates the greatest unsolved murder in American history, reveals a crucial piece of evidence in the hunt for Bigfoot .

programme.title: Big Beach Builds S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Rare And Recycled - Marnie gives a one-of-a-kind breezeway home close to the beach a tune-up.

programme.title: Big Beach Builds S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Big Beach Builds - Contractor Marnie Oursler gives outdated beach houses a new lease on life.

programme.title: Expedition Bigfoot S4 Ep2
programme.desc: Demon In The Dark - The team suspects a shapeshifting creature from Alaskan lore may be responsible for the haunting howls heard near a remote lake.

programme.title: Portals To Hell S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Fort Mifflin - Katrina takes Jack to Philadelphia to investigate the historic Fort Mifflin. They discover something unexpected is stationed at this Revolutionary War fortress.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep48
programme.desc: Earl Tappercorn / Queen Bea - When Archibald watches an asteroid make impact, he soon discovers that it was actually a spacecraft containing an alien. As the authorities close in, its up to Archibald to get the weary traveler back to his home planet. / When Archibald invites Beas extended family to visit, he makes a shocking discovery.Bea is a princess!

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep48
programme.desc: The Panchurian Candidate - After Uncle King Julien turned Pancho into a deadly killer so he could take back his throne, King Julien must save the kingdom before it's too late

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy Ep70
programme.desc: The Rival Racer - A swift new recruit joins the school racing team, putting Lucky's dreams of riding out front in jeopardy. Pru and Abigail clash over a class project.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep9
programme.desc: Wary Lotta & the Chamber of Secrets / VHMess - Lotta spills a secret and worries the kids of Harvey Street wont like her if they hear it! The girls discover a broken VHS tape which inspires them to film their own ending.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep9
programme.desc: Turbo Drift - The snails and Tito travel to Tokyo to film a commercial and Turbo is challenged to a drift race against a beautiful and mysterious female cricket.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep4
programme.desc: Gopher it! / A Glamping We Will Go - When a pesky gopher gets in the way of Fawna making her famous veggie stew, Niah learns to not let a bad experience, get in the way of doing good. / When the inexperienced Rona has to step in for Donna, the team makes sure everyone has the best camping trip ever.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep48
programme.desc: Earl Tappercorn / Queen Bea - When Archibald watches an asteroid make impact, he soon discovers that it was actually a spacecraft containing an alien. As the authorities close in, its up to Archibald to get the weary traveler back to his home planet. / When Archibald invites Beas extended family to visit, he makes a shocking discovery.Bea is a princess!

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep14
programme.desc: The Imposter / Frenemy - When there is an imposter in Troll Village, Branch and Poppy embark on a man-hunt as to try to keep the Trolls from realizing that anything is off/Poppy discovers that Archer Pastry belongs to a group of evil creatures called the Party Crashers

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep33

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep1
programme.desc: Hidden - Puss stumbles upon the legendary hidden city of San Lorenzo, and soon finds himself forced to protect it from thieves.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep5
programme.desc: Rupert and the Cloud Shepherd - Rupert, Ping Pong, Bill and Ming help the Cloud Shepherd find some missing clouds that have sneaked away to play. But how can the friends get them back up into the sky?

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep6
programme.desc: Rupert and the Magic Carpet - When Ming gets stuck up a tree, Rupert, Ping Pong and Bill try to rescue her but, thanks to Edward's mistakes, they all get stuck too. Can Edward overcome his fear of heights and save them?

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep31
programme.desc: Why Are There So Many Ladybirds? - One winter morning Jess finds lots of ladybird in his barn. Why are they there? That's the Big Question! Mimi tells him that she has lots of ladybirds in her garden in the summer. They're always hungry and brilliant for the plants because they eat all the greenfly. Maybe they're looking for greenfly in his barn? Jess doesn't think so. There are no greenfly in the barn. He goes to ask Baa and Billie for help. They're saying goodbye to Little Bird who's flying away to a warmer country for the winter. Jess thinks maybe the ladybirds are gathering to fly away too and rushes back to his barn to say goodbye. But when he gets there he finds that the ladybirds are now all huddled together and fast asleep. What's going on? Jess goes to ask Willow and finds a hedgehog sleeping under some leaves near the stable. Willow explains that some animals find it hard to find food in the winter, especially if they can't store it, so they eat as much as they can and then go to sleep during the winter. It's called hibe

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep32
programme.desc: How Can I Stop Little Bird Eating The Seeds? - Mimi's really upset with Little Bird who keeps eating all her lettuce seeds. Jess wonders how they can stop her. They try putting out extra food for her but Little Bird just eats everything! Jess wonders if covering the seeds with something so that Little Bird can't reach them would work. Mimi says it's a good idea but the sun won't reach the seeds either which means they won't grow. The only thing that seems to stop t Little Bird is when she sees Jess and is frightened away. But Jess can't stand still in the vegetable patch forever! Willow sees him and tells him he's being a scarecrow. A scarecrow? Yes, something that scares away the birds. Mimi has a brilliant idea to make the perfect scarecrow. A Jess scarecrow. Little Bird stops eating the lettuce seeds and eats from the lovely bird table they put out for her instead. Hooray!

programme.title: Olivia Ep5
programme.desc: Olivia Takes A Road Trip - On the looooong drive to Grandma's house, Olivia finds ways to pass the time. She imagines her family traveling in style, as she pilots her very own jumbo jetOlivia Air! By the time they arrive at Grandma's, Olivia's had so much fun that the discomfort of the road trip has been forgotten.

programme.title: Olivia Ep6
programme.desc: Olivia Goes International - When asked to give a presentation for her class's International Day. Olivia can't decide which country to choose. Being Olivia she invents her own country Olivitania -where cupcakes are the national food and the national anthem sounds suspiciously like Puccini.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep16
programme.desc: Body Double - In preparation for peace talks with the crocodiles, King Julien hires a body double to go in his place.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep16
programme.desc: Grug Vs Math / Footless - Amber announces that math is the new skill that every hunter must have. Grug cannot seems to grasp the concept and enlists Squawk to help him/Grug and Snoot ban dancing when it causes a rock slide. Eep sets up an underground dance club against the adults' wishes.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep42
programme.desc: Humanning / Know It All - When Tip wants her nose pierced, Oh and the Boov become obsessed with modifying their bodies/Tip doesn't want to go to school anymore and discovers a shortcut to infinite knowledge

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep42
programme.desc: Magic Hiccups / Gaius Maecenas - Sherman accidentally swallows Sweet Tune's magic flute and gets a case of magical hiccups, creating complete chaos on the show.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep42
programme.desc: Lucky and the Jam Jam - The PALs try to figure out why Marciela is acting so weird, while Miradero is gripped by April Fools Day fever

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep28
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Angry Abnormal Atrocities of the Astute Animal Agressors - Stuck in separate camps, Harold and George unleash a hyperintelligent talking possum to scare the pants off of Krupp. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep29
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Abysmal Altercation of the Abominable Altitooth - Eager to get the campers out of his hair, Krupp orders them to climb Plummet Peak, where a terrifying creature is rumored to reside.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep12
programme.desc: Hang in There, Baby - When Mega Fat CEO Baby claims he has dirt that could get Boss Baby fired, Boss Baby and the team try to find a way to get it first!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep13
programme.desc: Six Well-Placed Kittens - When Bootsy's plan of 6 strategically placed kittens brings the whole town down, Mega Fat is forced to team with Boss Baby

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep5
programme.desc: The Gateway to The Desert - A mysterious figure helps Po escape the guards, so Po makes his way to a desert market, determined to prove Blade wrong for leaving him behind. But when he accidentally stumbles into Klaus and Veruca, he and Blade awkwardly reunite while giving chase, and work through their differences. But the mysterious figure has followed Po and tries to capture them, clearly a new threat to our team.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep36
programme.desc: Chummy Sparklestone / Giggleyum - When the Funtime Factory stops producing one of their frosting flavors, Poppy sets out to create a replacement. But is her new flavor, Giggleyum too delicious?/During a Troll mystery party, Cooper has the role of detective. But when the party is over, Detective Cooper now Chummy Sparklestone refuses to break character, and hes causing problems around the village!

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep23
programme.desc: Stories - Artephius and the orphans are alone in town when a Celtic thunder god demands to be let into the treasure house or he will destroy San Lorenzo!

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep50
programme.desc: My Big Fat Gran Wedding / The Strutting Edge - After being called out for having commitment issues by Grug, Gran decides to make the ultimate commitment: marrying Mow!; After embarrassingly choking at the prior Valley's beastie Pageant, Eep asks previous winner Gran to train her to be the best

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep37
programme.desc: Once Upon A Time in Denmark - When Odlulu uses the Fairytale Key to pull Hans Christian Andersens fairytale characters from an old storybook and into present day Copenhagen, the Wanderers must rely on their knowledge of these timeless stories to put these characters back where they belong.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep24
programme.desc: Bigpaw, Big Problems / Captain Scooch and Scally-Tag - Tag, Scooch and Kit think they found the perfect story for their newspaper: Bigpaw is in Pawston! But when they find out that Frank and Beans were lying to the town, they seek to uncover the truth and reveal it to everyone. \ When Sam Whippet sets up a pirate-themed race for the Race Cadets, pirate-loving Scooch takes on the role of captain. Tag struggles to take orders as first mate while helping Scooch navigate maritime obstacles and avoid the fearsome pirates.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep5
programme.desc: The Amazing Donna / Bye, Bye Boardie - When Donna decides to show off her not-so-flashy skills as a magician at the Community Center talent show, the Zenkos must do everything they can to save her act from becoming an embarrassing disaster. / After Sams favorite skateboard accidentally gets put in with donations Mr. Tanaka is collecting for a fundraiser, the team is led on a merry chase as the skateboard passes from one Harmony Harbor denizen to another.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep19
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Clippy Claws - Pat has a very special delivery today! Micawber's claws need clipping and Pat needs to deliver not only the claw clippers but Amy the vet too! On the way to the lighthouse though they encounter all sorts of animals needing help today from a poorly Bonnie with a cold to a fretful Pumpkin who doesn't want to take his horse pills! Meanwhile, poor Micawber's claws are so long and he's so upset by getting them tangled up in things like Chris's scarf and the lighthouse tablecloth that he flies out of the window, carrying the tangled lighthouse keys in his claws! Chris tries to get them back and finds himself locked out of the lighthouse altogether! Luckily, Pat and Amy arrive in the SDS helicopter. Pat lowers Amy down to Micawber who is perched on top of the lighthouse and she's soon able to clip his claws and retrieve the keys. Phew! Well done Amy and well done Pat!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep20
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Sorting Machine - Pat and Jess are called to Cardiff to collect a new sorting machine when the Pencaster machine breaks down. Whilst they negotiate with Rowena Roberts, the Cardiff sorting office manager, as to how to move the heavy machine onto the SDS plane, Ben is fighting his own battles at the Pencaster office as his merry band of helpers from the village cause more chaos in their attempts to sort the post!After a quick tour of Gilbertson Castle, Pat and Jess manage to get the new sorting machine to Pencaster just in time to deliver a missing birthday present to Meera. Happy Birthday Meera and well done, Postman Pat!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep23
programme.desc: King Burple - After Burple and Cutter crash-land in a village of tiny dragons, Burple's unintentional act of courage leads the locals to crown him as their king.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep49
programme.desc: King of Camp / Dancing Disco Zombies - Archibald goes to camp and discovers his bunkmate is molting! Archibald helps his new friend find his groove and still have a good time at camp. / When Archibald accidentally creates the catchiest disco melody ever made, the whole town cannot stop dancing.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep49
programme.desc: The Wrath Of Morticus Khan - King Julien clones himself but things take a turn for the worse when Morticus Khan, an evil warlord, unleashes an army of Mort clones on the kingdom

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy Ep71
programme.desc: Palentine's Day - The PALs make plans for the Valentine's Day dance, then pivot to scare off a group of raiders who've come to rob the headmaster's vault.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep10
programme.desc: The Great Brain Robbery / Can't Purr-y Love - A brain freeze inspires Melvin to make up for all of his wrongs! Lotta does everything she can to win over a little kitten.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep10
programme.desc: Ready, Set, Glow / Breakneck's Back - In order to investigate one of Skidmark's conspiracy theories, Turbo and Skid join a dangerous underground zip line race/The crew is surprised when Whiplash enters the town's annual Tomato Games. Turbo discovers that Whiplash is really trying to keep an eye on an untrustworthy snail who is Whiplash's former mentor.

programme.desc: Berry's Bunker / Matilda's Birthday - An impending threat leads Rocksy, Leaf, and Twig to beg Berry to share her secret underground bunker. / The Mighty Ones throw competing surprise parties for Matildas birthday.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep2
programme.desc: Sphinx - Puss accidentally gives the orphans a magic substance that will ultimately make them explode. The only cure is guarded by a Sphinx who challenges Puss with riddles - and contrary to his own belief, Puss is not good at riddles.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep38
programme.desc: Yellow 100 - Finally promoted to CEO, Boss Baby sets his sights on achieving 100% Baby Love, while dealing with the annoying Puppies and Preeks who rented Baby Corp office space while Boss was gone. Tim and Danny become local heroes after saving a baby's life.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep39
programme.desc: Pyg & Tam - Boss Baby encounters a new threat to Baby Love: an adorable Baby TV show starring Pyg the Pygmy Goat, Tam the Tamandua, and their host Maria-Maria. Boss is told not to go to Corporate War by Board Baby Emiliano, so Boss tries to provoke his enemies to make the first move.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep7
programme.desc: Rupert and the Cheeky Sneeze - When one of Rupert's sneezes escapes the friends have to find it a home in the forest.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep8
programme.desc: Rupert and the Special Sandcastle - Despite Miranda's warnings a sandcastle competition in Rocky Bay is in danger from the incoming tide

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep33
programme.desc: How Can I Go Up And Down On The See-Saw? - Baa and Billie have built a fantastic new see-saw in the meadow. Jess can't wait to have a go. But when he tries to make it go up and down with him on one end and Baa and Billie on the other he just gets stuck in the air and can't get the see saw down. How can I go up and down on the see saw?' he asks? -desperate to have all the up and down' fun he see the puppies having when they jump on the see-saw. Jess asks Horace the hoppy frog what he knows about up and down', he talks to Willow about scales and weighing things until finally he works it out if he finds someone roughly the same weight as him balanced just like the puppies were - he'll do it! He works out that Mimi - of all his friends- weighs about the same as him and just as he worked out they jump on the see saw and go up and down, up and down and have a fantastic time! Yippety Yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep34
programme.desc: What Can I Do With My Nature Collection? - Jess shows Mimi his lovely Nature Collection. She really likes it and wonders what he's going to do with it. Now that's a good question! Jess thinks he'll display it but with the pups racing around it'd soon get damaged. He asks Horace if he could use it to make musical instruments, some things make a great sound but others aren't so good. It's time to go on a picnic with Mimi and his friends. Jess brings his Nature Collection along and when all his friends want to play a game Jess has a great idea. He's found the perfect thing to do with his Nature Collection! They can use them to make a funny obstacle course race. Brilliant!

programme.title: Olivia Ep7
programme.desc: Olivia And Her Alien Brother - After a trip to the planetarium, Ian's knowledge about space and his peculiar behaviour lead Olivia to believe that her brother is an alien. Olivia soon discovers his secrethe's making a special gift for his favourite sister

programme.title: Olivia Ep8
programme.desc: Olivia Plants A Garden - When Mrs. Hogenmuller distributes seeds for a class garden project, Olivia just can't wait for her plants to grow. But when her dog Perry digs up her little garden, Olivia discovers something even more exciting what appears to be a dinosaur bone!

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep17
programme.desc: Election - After hes rescued from a cave, a charismatic old lemur challenges Julien to an election for the throne.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep17
programme.desc: The Good Surprise / Nightmare On Eep Street - When Ugga's new surprise attack fails, and she comes home in a bad mood, Thunk tries to cure it by finding a happy surprise for his mom/ Eep stays up all night to see the mysterious and rare Night Mare (a horse with a rainbow mane) when she's teased for thinking they're not real.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep43
programme.desc: Only The Lucky Survive / Shar-Squad - Tip tricks Oh into thinking he's invincible to convince him to go on a dangerous adventure/Sharzod takes revenge when she loses her squad to her arch-rival Fance

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep43
programme.desc: Sherman's Tooth / Voyager Gold Record - When Sherman wants to pull his loose tooth for Tooth Fairy cash, Peabody brings a historical dentist on the show. Sherman's fear causes problems.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep43
programme.desc: Lucky and the Escape Artist - Soon-to-be-big sister Lucky borrows Snips for a day to see what its like to have a little sibling, but nothing goes as planned

programme.desc: Come sing along with baby John, his brother, Jack, and sister, Jill in Little Angel!

programme.desc: Come sing along with baby John, his brother, Jack, and sister, Jill in Little Angel!

programme.desc: Join Mia, Twinkle the Star and Baby Max for some of your favourite nursery rhymes!

programme.desc: Join Mia, Twinkle the Star and Baby Max for some of your favourite nursery rhymes!

programme.desc: Join Blippi on his quest for knowledge in his BlippiMobile!

programme.title: Blippi Wonders - Exploring The Planet and the Seasons S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Join Blippi on his quest for knowledge in his BlippiMobile!
